title: I was afraid it will ruin the good experience from the book and TV mini series, but it did not
review: a great add-on to the IT world. more 'book accurate' than the TV mini series. a great experience. much more violent. I'm in love with Beverly :) I was concerned that it will ruin the experience, but it was really cool. love this reboot, waiting for part 2 ;) BTW, the kids are all great actors, and the Japanese cinematographer add a lot of atmosphere to the movie.
